PROBLEM STATMENT: 
 
By virtue of being a top-ranked technical institute in Kolkata, NETAJI SUBHASH ENGINEERING 
 
COLLEGE and AVENIR feel their obligation towards society to spread the world of technology 
 
throughout the globe. Robotics, needless to say, has been the most interesting field of 
 
technical advancements in recent times! 
 
Introduction : Once upon a time there was a king. The king had everything he wanted. But one 
 
thing the king lacked, he did not have a dream girl so one a day he saddled his strongest horse and 
 
departed in search of a perfect queen all alone. After a long time one night the king arrived at a lake 
 
and decided to haltand there he saw a beautiful lady. He asked the lady to be queen but she said that 
 
she was cursed by a demon. The demon killed her parents and cursed her that she would die if she 
 
goes out of lake. But lady told him there was a one way to become free. The king had to travel a 
 
rough terrain and collect four blue flower. Then he had to climb to the top of the mountain and 
 
placed the flower at proper position then he had to dance with some beat of drums until the flower 
 
turns red..think u r the king..and play this fabulous robo game. 
 
Objective: To make a manually controlled bot which perform various 
 
performance 1.move through various terrain 
 
2.pick up the block and place it another place. 
 
3.At last bot have to make a shape using blocks. 
 
GAMEPLAY: Firstly you have to start from position A. After go through the curvature plane you have to 
 
pick up the block go through the terrain .and placed it in position B*.then you have to go through the 
 
twisted bridge. And then again you have to pick up then block and go through the terrain. And then 
 
placed it in position E*.and again you have to pick up the block and go through the terrain and placed it 
 
F*.Then you have to go on stage and make a triangle and square with some block. 
 
RULES: 
 
GENERAL RULE: 
 
? The team can have a maximum of 4 members 
 
? Any team that is not ready at the time specified will be disqualified from the competition 
 
automatically. 
 
? A team may consist of students from different colleges. 
 
? The judgesâ€™ decision shall be treated as final and binding on all. 
 
? All students with a valid identity card of their respective educational institutes are eligible 
 
to participate in the event. 
 
Event Structure: 
 
? Each team get two chance 
 
a. Trail round 
 
b. Final attempt 
 
? Marks will be given for final attempt only 
 
? After finishing round 1 we select team among those grand finale will be happened. 
 
GAME FORMAT: 
 
? You have to start from A position and after reaching point B you will get 100 point. 
 
? From B to C, you will get 25 point. 
 
? From C to D, you will get 25 point 
 
? From E to F, you will get 100 point. 
 
? From F to G, you will get 50 point. 
 
? For picking the block you will get 25 point and for placing the block you will get 25 point. 
 
? For making the triangle you will get 200 point and for making the square you will get 
 
300 point. 
 
ROBOT SPECIFICATION: 
 
? The robots should be controlled manually. 
 
? The robot must be wired. 
 
? The robot cannot have any mechanism that can damage the arena in any manner. 
 
? The robots shall be inspected before the event. Failing the inspection shall lead to 
 
disqualification. 
 
? The machine must not be made from Lego parts, or any ready-made assembly kits. Readily 
 
available chassis layouts are not allowed. Any machine having a ready-made chassis will be 
 
disqualified. 
 
Dimensions and Weight: 
 
? The robot should not be more than 250mm*250mm*250mm (length*breadth*height) in 
 
size at the start of the event. It can then extend to any height, but the length and breadth 
 
should remain in the limit. 
 
? The weight of the any robot should not, in any case, exceed 4 kg. 
 
Batteries and Power: 
 
? Each team must have their own batteries to power their bots. 
 
? Voltage must not exceed 24 volts between any two points. External power supply(230v a.c) 
 
will be provided.
